name: Spacer
short_description: Visual divider with no stored value.

properties1.name: name
properties1.description: (mandatory) is the unique name of the field.

properties2.name: label
properties2.description: (optional) (translatable) is the text to use as a spacer.

properties3.name: description
properties3.description: (optional) (translatable) is text that will be shown as a tooltip when the user moves the mouse over the drop-down box.

properties4.name: hr
properties4.description: (optional) is whether to display a horizontal rule ('true' or 'false'). If this attribute is 'true', the label attribute will be ignored.

properties5.name: class
properties5.description: (optional) is a CSS class name for the HTML form field.

description: The spacer form field type provides a visual separator between groups of form fields. It serves purely as a visual aid to organize the layout of the form and does not store any value.
